value.title: StarCraft 2: Can Maru/Byun fend off the NA Clowns in an EPIC 2v2? | PiG Reacts
value.excerpt: I was going to cast this as an FPV vid, but listening and reacting to Special+Astrea playing 2v2 against Maru+Byun was just too funny. Great match, great reactions from Special, really fun series. This best of 5 series was played as a precursor to Nation Wars 2022.  Follow Special on Twitch! https://www.twitch.tv/special_

I'm allowed to make any army units for defending, as long as I don't attack

value.title: StarCraft 2: ~80 SUPPLY WIDOW MINE DROP! (TY vs soO)
value.excerpt: This game of StarCraft 2 includes the biggest Widow Mine drop I've ever seen at the professional level in SC2. Roughly 80 supply worth of Brood Lords and Corruptors goes up in a matter of seconds as TY comes in from the side with a massive Medivac flank. In this video I cast a long drawn out macro game
